definition: To provide an account or convey information about an event, situation, or topic, typically through verbal or written means. It is commonly used in news reporting, storytelling, or sharing personal experiences.

examples.german: Sie berichtete über ihre Reise nach Paris.
examples.english: She reported on her trip to Paris.

examples.german: Die Zeitung berichtete über den Unfall.
examples.english: The newspaper reported on the accident.

examples.german: Er berichtete von seinen Erfahrungen im Ausland.
Der Zeuge muss vor Gericht berichten.
examples.english: The witness has to testify in court.
